Taken from their MySpace:
PLACES OF POWER is a new monicker behind which two familiar faces are hiding the beginning of their newest collaboration. Bruce Turgon (ex Foreigner, Shadow King, Lou Gramm, Atomic Playboys) and Philip Bardowell (ex Unruly Child, Magdalen) started working together on a blistering set of new songs. The fans can expect a magnificent melodic Hard Rock release, set to blend the best elements of Turgon's songwriting and musicianship together with the acclaimed powerful vocals from Bardowell, in order to create a real musical milestone akin to the best Foreigner and Shadow King albums. Something to get very excited about!
